DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine what the study drug does to the body, what the body does to the study drug, and if the study drug is safe and well tolerated when given to adult healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study To Evaluate The Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics And Pharmacodynamics Of Pf-05230907 In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subjects. Healthy nonchild bearing female subjects. 18 to 35 years of age. Heart disease. Clotting disorders. Use of nicotine products. Diabetes.
